feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.28.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Sort routes by ID and remove DNS routes from overlapping list by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2234
  • Fix issue with canceled context before pushing metrics and decreasing pushing interval by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2235
  • Avoid empty domain overwrite by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2252
  • Add release version to windows binaries and update sign pipeline version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2256
  • Get client ui locale on windows natively by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2251
  • Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.64.0 to 1.64.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2248
  • Fix parameter limit issue for Postgres store by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2261
  • Support DNS routes on iOS by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2254
  • fix 2260: fallback serial to Board by @EdouardVanbelle in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2263
  • Add logging option for WG device by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2271
  • Limit GUI process execution to one per UID by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2267
  • Add batch save/update for groups and users by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2245
  • fix forwarded metrics by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2273
  • Ignore non unique route updates by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2266
  • feat(client): send logs to syslog by @mrl5 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2259
  • refactor(util): fix sonarcube issues by @mrl5 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2276
  • Add get_registration_delay_milliseconds metric by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2275
  • Fix metric label typo by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2278
  • fix: save peer status correctly in sqlstore by @ctrl-zzz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2262
  • Support custom SSL certificates for the signal service by @benniekiss in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2257
  • Wait on daemon down by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2279
  • Don't add exclusion routes for IPs that are part of connected networks by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2258
  • Add faster availability DNS probe and update test domain to .com by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2280
  • Check if route interface is a Microsoft ISATAP device by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2282
  • Remove copy functions from signal by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2285
  • Refactor macOS system DNS configuration by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2284
  • Fix macOS DNS unclean shutdown restore call on startup by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2286

New Contributors

  • @EdouardVanbelle made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2263
  • @mrl5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2259
  • @ctrl-zzz made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2262
  • @benniekiss made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2257

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.28.4...v0.28.5

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.28.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Minor fix local dns search domain by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2287
  • Remove default allow for UDP on unmatched packet by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2300
  • Retry management connection only on context canceled by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2301
  • Ignore network monitor checks for software interfaces by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2302

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.28.5...v0.28.6

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.28.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix error handling by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2316
  • add save peer status test for connected peers by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2321
  • Add SavePeer method to prevent a possible account inconsistency by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2296
  • Fix race in set listener by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2332
  • Save daemon address on service install by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2328
  • Remove redundant check for empty JWT groups by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2323
  • Refactor login with store.SavePeer by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2334
  • fix(tests): freebsd should be red on error by @skillcoder in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2346
  • Add write lock for peer when saving its connection status by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2359
  • Save account on saving users and groups by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2362
  • Move write peer lock by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2364
  • Freebsd test all root component by @skillcoder in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2361
  • Use accountID retrieved from the sync call to acquire read lock sooner by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2369
  • Handling invalid UTF-8 character in sys info by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2360
  • When creating new setup key, "revoked" field doesn't do anything by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2357
  • Bump github.com/docker/docker from 26.1.3+incompatible to 26.1.4+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2356
  • fix(util): syslog output contains duplicated timestamp by @mrl5 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2292
  • Allow route updates even if some domains failed resolution by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2368
  • Adding geolocation download log message. by @keac in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2085
  • Add extra auth audience field on HttpConfig for automation user to authorize via zitadel by @dfry in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2350
  • Extend client debug bundle by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2341
  • Move Bundle to before netbird down by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2377
  • Fix Windows file version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2380
  • Remove Codacy badge as it is broken by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2379
  • Fix DNS resolution for routes on iOS by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2378
  • Add sonar badge by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2381

New Contributors

  • @keac made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2085
  • @dfry made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2350

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.28.6...v0.28.7

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.28.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [misc] Use docker compose command by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2382
  • [client] change default config location on freebsd by @skillcoder in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2388
  • [client] Offer only Device Code Flow on FreeBSD by @skillcoder in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2389
  • [client] Fix windows binary version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2390
  • [client] On iOS add error handling for getRouteselector by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2394
  • [management] Skip network map check if not regular user by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2402
  • [management] Improve mgmt sync performance by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2363
  • [client] Update dependencies and switch systray library by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2309
  • [management] Add batch delete for groups and users by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2370
  • [client] Allow setup keys to be provided in a file by @moosetheory in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2337
  • [misc] Update bug-issue-report.md to include netbird debug cmd by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2413
  • [client] Parse data from setup key by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2411
  • [misc] Update bug-issue-report.md to include anon flag by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2412
  • [management] Prevent removal of All group from peers during user groups propagation by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2410
  • [client] Upgrade fyne version to fix freezing routes window by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2417
  • [client] Mtls support by @Foosec in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2188
  • [client] Update PNG systray disconnected icon by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2428
  • [misc] Fix linting Issues by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2427
  • [misc] Update Slack invite link by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2445
  • [management] Split DB calls in peer login by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2439
  • [misc] Loading tun module for synology in install.sh by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2423
  • [misc] Use clearer wording on issue template by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2443
  • [client] Replace windows network monitor implementation by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2450
  • [management] Fix logging out peers on deletion by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2453
  • [management] Add buffering for getAccount requests during login by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2449

New Contributors

  • @moosetheory made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2337
  • @Foosec made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.28.7...v0.28.8

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.28.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] Rename request buffer and update default interval by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2459
  • [client] Add test for SetFlagsFromEnvVars by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2460
  • [client] Refactor free port function by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2455
  • [misc] Bump github.com/docker/docker from 26.1.4+incompatible to 26.1.5+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2426
  • [misc] Add support for NETBIRD_STORE_ENGINE_POSTGRES_DSN environment variable in setup.env by @arosberg in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2462
  • [management] Refactor HTTP metrics by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2476

New Contributors

  • @arosberg made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2462

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.28.8...v0.28.9
